sobremi.resumen:
I'm a developer in constant growth of skills and knowledge.
to keep on growing i'm always looking my own achivments, discarding flaws on my doing.
Direct and simple communication. and empathy with my partners is essential for me.
It applies to all my relationships, whether it is work related or not.
In the work i search for resolving errors and avoid mistakes.

resumen.formacion1:
Introduction to programming in general and the paradigm of object oriented programming.
Exercises of programming with pseudocode
resumen.formacion2:
Basic concepts of syntax, logic, algorithms, relations. Structure of the language. Check code.
Exercises in Java, implementation of good practices in writing code (indentation, order, separation by components).
resumen.formacion3:
Front-end and back-end programming in Python. With the tools:
HTML, CSS, BOOSTRAP, FLEXBOX, FLASK, PHPMyAdmin, github, VSCode, SQL.
Exercise in solo and in group, post publishing web site.
resumen.formacion4:
Front-end and back-end programming in JavaScript. With the tools:
HTML, CSS, BOOSTRAP, FLEXBOX, NodeJS, MySql, github, VSCode.
Creation of database, web applications with functions.
resumen.formacion5:
Services web using Javascript and Typescript, in Angular_V16.
As complementary tools, we learned how to work with:
Boostwatch, Postman, NodeJS, express, Postman, sequelize, relational databases.
resumen.experiencia1:
Instalations, maintenance and reparations manager on alarms systems, monitoring security cameras, and acces controls.
Server administrator for security cameras servers, user master of:
Windows, Networking, license software, office packages.
travel work for maintenance and repairs on distant locations.
Planning work schedules for own labor work force and contractors.
Proefssional advice, budgets, indirect sales, and administrations duties over the work planed.
resumen.experiencia2:
Alarm system and CCTV installer.
schedules manager, customers support, and insums handling and budget ejecution.
Personnel management.
resumen.experiencia3: maintenance installations, repairs, alarms, and access control. Each system with its respective operating system.
